      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_4788ba652e0e9742d93fe159e7a42f0fcf636599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The energy from a burning petrol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Energie von einem brennenden Treibstoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'énergie d'une essence brûlante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A energia de um petrol ardente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia proveniente da una benzina burning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ενέργεια από μια καίγοντας βενζίνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La energía de una gasolina ardiente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how the energy produced in burning petrol is converted to useful and wasteful forms.  Only 25% of the petrol energy is converted to useful energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">petrol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie die Energie, die in 
brennendem Treibstoff produziert wird, in die nützlichen und 
kostspieligen Formulare umgewandelt wird. Nur 25% der 
Treibstoffenergie wird in nützliche Energie umgewandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment l'énergie produite 
en essence brûlante est convertie en formes utiles et inutiles. 
Seulement 25% de l'énergie d'essence est converti en énergie 
utile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como a energia produzida em 
petrol ardente é convertida aos formulários úteis e 
desperdiçadors. Somente 25% da energia do petrol é convertido 
à energia útil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come l'energia prodotta in 
benzina burning è convertita in forme utili e dispendiose. 
Soltanto 25% dell'energia della benzina è convertito in energia
utile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς η ενέργεια που 
παράγεται στο κάψιμο της βενζίνης μετατρέπεται στις χρήσιμες και 
σπάταλες μορφές. Μόνο 25% της ενέργειας βενζίνης 
μετατρέπεται στη χρήσιμη ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo la energía producida
en gasolina ardiente se convierte a las formas útiles y 
derrochadoras. El solamente 25% de la energía de la gasolina se
convierte a la energía útil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Treibstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stichhaltige Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">essence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie saine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">petrol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia sadia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia térmica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">benzina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia sana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βενζίνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υγιής ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gasolina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía sana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía termal</string>
          </keyword>
